data.comment: We are now ready for the penalty shootout!
Siem de Jong (Cincinnati) walks up to the ball...
In the minute 0, The next penalty is for Portland. Will Diego Valeri take this opportunity?
Allan Cruz (Cincinnati) scores!
Felipe Mora (Portland) succeeds from the penalty spot.
In the minute 0, Jurgen Locadia (Cincinnati) fails to convert his penalty!
Sebastian Blanco (Portland) converts his penalty!
Kendall Waston (Cincinnati) misses his penalty attempt!
In the minute 0, Jaroslaw Niezgoda (Portland) scores from the penalty spot.
It's 4-2 at the end of the penalty shootout.
The match is underway in Orlando.
Throw-in for Portland at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 2, Frankie Amaya for Cincinnati gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Portland have a goal kick.
Portland attack but Jeremy Ebobisse's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 4, Ball goes out of play for a Cincinnati goal kick.
Armando Villarreal signals a throw-in for Cincinnati, close to Portland's area.
Cincinnati to take a throw-in in Portland territory.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Cincinnati close to the penalty box.
Cincinnati are coming forward and Joseph-Claude Gyau gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Armando Villarreal awards Portland a goal kick.
In the minute 8, Can Portland get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cincinnati's half?
Goal kick for Cincinnati at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Portland just outside Cincinnati's area.
In the minute 10, Sebastian Blanco gets his shot on target but fails to score for Portland.
Corner awarded to Portland.
Cincinnati awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 11, Free kick Cincinnati.
Armando Villarreal signals a Portland throw-in in Cincinnati's half.
Cincinnati awarded a free kick in their own half.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Cincinnati in their own half.
In the minute 18, Sebastian Blanco (Portland) has received a yellow card from Armando Villarreal.
Throw-in for Portland in their own half.
In the minute 20, Portland's Sebastian Blanco breaks free at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Cincinnati have a goal kick.
Cincinnati are whistled for offside.
In the minute 22, Portland's Yimmi Chara gets in a shot on goal at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Portland's Chris Duvall gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Armando Villarreal awards Cincinnati a goal kick.
In the minute 24, Armando Villarreal signals a Portland throw-in in Cincinnati's half.
Cincinnati to take a throw-in in Portland territory.
Diego Valeri for Portland drives towards goal at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 27, Portland push forward at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex and Jeremy Ebobisse gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Cincinnati defence.
Sebastian Blanco (Portland) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Portland get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cincinnati's half?
In the minute 29, Portland have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Cincinnati in their own half.
Jorge Villafana (Portland) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 30, Cincinnati's Yuya Kubo gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Portland defender.
Free kick in a good position for Cincinnati!
In the minute 31, Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cincinnati's Andrew Gutman has been booked in Orlando.
Ball goes out of play for a Cincinnati goal kick.
Can Portland capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cincinnati's half?
In the minute 36, Important block from the Cincinnati defence as Eryk Williamson fires in a strike for Portland.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Cincinnati in their own half.
Portland's Sebastian Blanco is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 37, Can Portland get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cincinnati's half?
Portland have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
In Orlando Cincinnati drive forward through Adrien Regattin. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 41, Portland have a dangerous throw-in.
Cincinnati drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Goal kick for Cincinnati at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 43, Cincinnati will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Portland.
Diego Valeri for Portland drives towards goal at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Portland.
In the minute 45, Portland drive upfield and Eryk Williamson gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Cincinnati defender.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Cincinnati.
Portland to take a throw-in in Cincinnati territory.
Armando Villarreal blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Orlando.
Can Portland capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Joseph-Claude Gyau for Cincinnati has been booked by Armando Villarreal and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 47, Portland pushes forward through Diego Valeri, whose finish on goal is saved.
Portland are pushing forward but Chris Duvall's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Cincinnati goal kick.
In the minute 48, Cincinnati needs to be cautious. Portland have an attacking throw-in.
Cincinnati awarded a free kick in their own half.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Cincinnati.
In the minute 51, Corner awarded to Portland.
Free kick Portland.
Cincinnati needs to be cautious. Portland have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 54, Armando Villarreal signals a Portland throw-in in Cincinnati's half.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Cincinnati in their own half.
Free kick Cincinnati.
In the minute 56, Kendall Waston (Cincinnati) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Portland have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Cincinnati at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 58, Fatai Alashe is replacing Frankie Amaya for Cincinnati at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 59, Can Portland get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cincinnati's half?
Allan Cruz is on a sub for Adrien Regattin for Cincinnati.
Cincinnati make their third substitution with Siem de Jong replacing Yuya Kubo.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Cincinnati.
Armando Villarreal blows against Cincinnati's Mathieu Deplagne for offside.
In the minute 64, Armando Villarreal signals a throw-in for Portland, close to Cincinnati's area.
Corner awarded to Portland.
In the minute 64, Cincinnati awarded a free kick in their own half.
Giovanni Savarese (Portland) is making a first substitution, with Jaroslaw Niezgoda replacing Yimmi Chara.
Haris Medunjanin (Cincinnati) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Portland drives forward and Sebastian Blanco gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 67, Portland have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
Goal! Jaroslaw Niezgoda gives Portland a 1-0 lead in Orlando.
That's a fine assist from Sebastian Blanco.
In the minute 69, Fatai Alashe's header is off-target for Cincinnati.
Armando Villarreal awards Portland a goal kick.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Cincinnati in their own half.
In the minute 72, Armando Villarreal signals a Portland throw-in in Cincinnati's half.
Cincinnati awarded a free kick in their own half.
Armando Villarreal awards Portland a goal kick.
In the minute 74, Jaap Stam is making the team's fourth substitution at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex with Jurgen Locadia replacing Caleb Stanko.
Jurgen Locadia of Cincinnati smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Portland to take a throw-in in Cincinnati territory.
In the minute 79, Cincinnati have been awarded a penalty...
The match is now all square at 1-1 thanks to a penalty from Jurgen Locadia.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 83, Portland's Jeremy Ebobisse gets in a shot on goal at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Cincinnati in their own half.
Cincinnati to take a throw-in in Portland territory.
In the minute 84, In Orlando Cincinnati drive forward through Allan Cruz. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Diego Valeri of Portland gets in a strike, but is off target.
Cincinnati have a goal kick.
In the minute 86, Siem de Jong gets his shot on target but fails to score for Cincinnati.
Cincinnati's Jurgen Locadia misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
Cincinnati awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 89, Giovanni Savarese is making the team's second substitution at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex with Andy Polo replacing Eryk Williamson.
Cincinnati make their fifth substitution with Kekuta Manneh replacing Joseph-Claude Gyau.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Portland.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
The fourth official's board shows 6 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Portland.
Portland have a dangerous throw-in.
Armando Villarreal signals a Portland throw-in in Cincinnati's half.
In Orlando Portland attack through Sebastian Blanco. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Cincinnati at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Goal kick for Cincinnati at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Free kick Cincinnati.
The score after normal time is 1-1.
Fatai Alashe (Cincinnati) has received a yellow card from Armando Villarreal.
Felipe Mora is on a sub for Jeremy Ebobisse for Portland.
